title: Non-Deduction of non-cessed Structure area in the scheme of 33(7) for FSI purpose: In case of mix of the structure i
clause_text: Non-Deduction of non-cessed Structure area in the scheme of 33(7) for FSI purpose: In case of mix of the structure i.e. cessed & non cessed structure and if the area of non cessed structure existing prior to 30/9/69, area of land component under non-cessed structure works out up to a limit of 25% of plot area, then FSI shall be considered on total plot area. If this area exceeds 25% of the total area, then area above 25% shall be deducted from plot area. FSI for deducted area shall be as per Regulation No 30 and the FSI for the remaining plot area shall be as per 33(7). Provision of clause no 2 above shall be made applicable to non-cessed occupier.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
